text: Hortelã is a settlement in the western part of the island of São Nicolau, Cape Verde. In 2010 its population was 181. It is situated at the southern foot of Monte Gordo, 5 km north of Tarrafal de São Nicolau and 6 km west of Ribeira Brava. ==See also== *List of villages and settlements in Cape Verde ==References== Category:Villages and settlements in São Nicolau, Cape Verde Category:Tarrafal de São Nicolau
title: Hortelã
